PSCT.Base: If "Umi" is on the field: Target monsters your opponent controls, up to the number of WATER monsters you control whose original Levels are 5 or higher; destroy them, and if you do, the zones they were in cannot be used until the end of the next turn. You can only activate 1 "Rage of Kairyu-Shin" per turn.
